item.title: Super Bowls Are Not the Ultimate Metric For Denver
item.description: The Denver Broncos have three Super Bowls, but one of the most prolific offenses in the 2013 team came up short in the playoffs. Which of these teams is the best Broncos team since the 1990 season? The Denver Broncos have been consistently bad over the last six seasons, since hall of game quarterback and the undisputed GOAT Peyton Manning retired. Now armed with another hall of fame quarterback that has already established themselves as an elite player, itâ€™s reminiscent of the trade for the equally undisputed GOAT John Elway.

item.title: What is the best Denver Broncos team since 1990?
About Dylan Bayles
item.description: Dylan Bayles is a sports videographer based in Omaha and Lincoln. He is currently a sophomore at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln and is majoring in Sports Media and Communication.
